::KitKat:

She nodded, looking at the pictures. "Yes, But I have grave news, 
They are both dead.  Killed by the maximals."  She pushed him out of 
the way as the missle and fire came her way.  She jumped, but a few 
seconds too late. She went flying through the air and landed with a 
thud.  She rolled a few feet and slowly got up.  She had gashes in 
her side and legs from the shrapnel.  She raised her rifle again and 
tool aim on Stronghold and Blender and opened fire.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:

Testifier ran up

> Testifier said.
>

Testifier

asked. He
